triples.name: SIGMOD
triples.relevance: The paper is the proceedings and editorial for the 2021 SIGMOD conference on database management.

triples.name: Data management
triples.relevance: Data management is the central focus of the SIGMOD conference and research track.

triples.name: Data science
triples.relevance: Data Science & Engineering was introduced as a new paper category in the SIGMOD research track.

triples.name: Machine learning
triples.relevance: Machine learning is discussed in the context of data science pipelines and the automation panel on ML and data science.

triples.name: Data integration
triples.relevance: Deep Data Integration is the subject of a keynote talk by Wang-Chiew Tan from Facebook AI.

triples.name: Data preparation
triples.relevance: Data preparation is discussed in the panel on automation of data prep, ML, and data science.

triples.name: Hardware acceleration
triples.relevance: Hardware optimization for data-intensive computations is the subject of Kenneth A. Ross's keynote on modern hardware design.
